title: 107_s2841
content: The Act may be cited as the "FHA Multifamily Housing Loan Limit Improvement Act" and it involves the indexing of multifamily mortgage limits. The "FHA Multifamily Housing Loan Limit Improvement Act" amends Section 207(c)(3) of the National Housing Act to adjust dollar amount limitations annually based on the Annual Construction Cost Index. The "FHA Multifamily Housing Loan Limit Improvement Act" adjusts dollar amount limitations in Section 213(b)(2) of the National Housing Act annually based on the Annual Construction Cost Index. The "FHA Multifamily Housing Loan Limit Improvement Act" adjusts dollar amount limitations in Section 213(b)(2) of the National Housing Act annually based on the Annual Construction Cost Index. Additionally, Section 220 Limits are also adjusted accordingly. The "FHA Multifamily Housing Loan Limit Improvement Act" adjusts dollar amount limitations in Section 213(b)(2) of the National Housing Act annually based on the Annual Construction Cost Index. The Secretary shall adjust each dollar amount limitation effective January 1 of each year, beginning in 2003, in accordance with the percentage increase in the Index. The "FHA Multifamily Housing Loan Limit Improvement Act" amends Section 221(d)(3)(ii) of the National Housing Act to adjust dollar amount limitations annually based on the Annual Construction Cost Index. The Secretary will adjust each limitation effective January 1 of each year, starting in 2003, according to the percentage increase in the Index. The "FHA Multifamily Housing Loan Limit Improvement Act" amends Section 221(d)(4)(ii) of the National Housing Act to adjust dollar amount limitations annually based on the Annual Construction Cost Index of the Department of Commerce. The Secretary will adjust each limitation effective January 1 of each year, starting in 2003, according to the percentage increase in the Index. The amendment adjusts dollar amount limitations annually based on the Annual Construction Cost Index of the Department of Commerce, effective January 1 of each year starting in 2003. The Department of Commerce adjusts dollar amount limitations annually, starting in 2003, based on the Annual Construction Cost Index. The Department of Commerce adjusts dollar amount limitations annually based on the Annual Construction Cost Index. This includes adjustments to dollar amounts and limitations as needed. SEC. 2. HIGH-COST AREAS. Section 207, 213, 220, and 221(d)(3) of the National Housing Act are amended to increase the percentage limits from 140% to 170% and from 110% to 140%. The National Housing Act is amended to increase percentage limits from 140% to 170% and from 110% to 140% in various sections such as 221(d)(4), 231, and 234.
